// This is a level data file used for testing purposes
// This is a comment

// The level's waypoints
01110011011

// The level's layout
000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000

131010101200000011101010101200000000000000000000

000000002000000020000000002000000000000000000000

000000000000000000002000002000000000000000000000
000000000000111010102200002000000000000000000000

000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000

000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000

// The level's waves. The lines are for: 
//     the entity type in each wave (uses 1 character),
//     the number of entities in each wave (uses 2 characters),
//     the delay before the next wave begins (uses 3 characters);
//
// If the delay before the next wave is 0 then the (default/previous) value is used
0110010110001011
08181808081808181808080818081818
03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c03c

// End of level data file
